channel.title: Client problems
channel.description:
Ok I been making my own client from this topic http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,220071.0.html
I done everything I wanted and it works perfect, but there's a problem.
I can only fill the Username and Password, I can't click the password box it just continues to type in Password.
How can I fix that?
Also, is there a way to make it automatlically type in my IP for the server in Server IP?

item.title: Client problems
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

Instant disconnection is server side, not client side.

Read full topic

item.title: Client problems
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

[quote=“doctoroo, post:4, topic:169898”][quote author=huggies link=topic=229700.msg1969391#msg1969391 date=1199237586]

well press enter

Omg read the darn post, I said I can’t click the Server IP box. So when(if) I release the client players won’t be able to connect to other server, just their own.
[/quote]

don’t spam and i said to press on your keyboard ok[/quote]

Lol I spam? I didn’t spam, you were much closer to spam as you said “well press enter”, obviously you tried to help but also you obviously didn’t read the thread either.

What the enter button got to do with this?! I’m saying I can’t click on the server IP box to enter the server IP. Wich will be bad if client will be released, then players won’t be able to type the server IP to join an server.

Read full topic
